name: Bloody Heaven 2 ：Prologue
description:
Bloody Heaven 2 ：Prologue is a rogue-like action game with Rune-build feature. Based on 4 basic actions: light attack, heavy attack, skill and dodge , you will assign runes in your weapon among slots of these 4 actions to build your battle style.

Creative Rune Frame System

Clean the room to collect runes, and arrange runes in weapon slots to acquire new abilities. Position and feature of runes matters a lot for your battle style.

There are 6 major series of runes and over 50 types of runes in the game. They are not perfectly balanced, but you will find some favorite runes for you.

Slash Into Hell

As the Revenge Agent of Heaven, you will be able to use more than 3 classes, 12 types of weapon to slash among demons.

Growing Power of Weapon

Kill demons to collect gems, and then turn gems into rune inlays for your weapon. The runes could provide various of new abilities to contribute to your battle style.

Death Is Beginning

If you die in a fight, the weapon is also lost with all the runes inlay. Your can start another challenge and if lucky enough, you could find the lost weapon.

Permanent Upgrade

Win or lose, when you reborn back to heaven, all the gems you collect along the way will turn to dust. Make use of these dust to unlock permanent upgrade.
